name: Flow Circular
description: Flow is a font family built for abstracting content and code for design mockups, wireframing, presentations, and websites. It's not perfect, but neither are your wireframes. Flow has sub-pixels, artifacts, overlaps and other imperfections. Flow comes in three styles: Circular Rounded and Block . Check out danross.co/flow/ . To contribute, see github.com/HYPD/flow-typeface . To learn more, read Flow and Redacted: Check out these new options for wireframes and other early-stage designs .
author: Dan Ross
